title: FS (Prices cut) - A trio of graded T206's.
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS (Prices cut) - A trio of graded T206's.
posts.post_content:
For Sale (Prices reduced) - A trio of T206's, prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.

T206 Red Dooin SC 150/25 - SGC 4.5  $170 venmo or zelle, $176 if you prefer pp gs.

T206 Al Mattern P350 - SGC 5  $235 venmo or zelle, $243.00 if you prefer pp gs.

T206 Ed Abbaticchio, Blue Sleeves SC 350-460/30 - PSA 2(mc) Name at top and bottom  $110 venmo or zelle, $115 if you prefer pp gs.
